attributes.action: The Use of All Mirrors In Our School, Broughton Hall.
attributes.additional_details:
In a society where aesthetic and presentation is so greatly prioritised, many suffer from body image issues and mirrors are very influential in our lives.
In our school, mirrors provide students with an opportunity to see how we visually present ourselves in school, which is a key aspect to our school values, where visual presentation seems to be a main priority to having undistracted learning. 
So, sign the petition and maybe the school will listen to us collectively.
attributes.background: Our school have placed a barrier over the mirrors above sinks in our school toilets.

rejection.details: This is a decision for your school, not the UK Government or Parliament. You could raise this issue with your school's governing body or senior leadership team.
